Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In most patients with isolated unilateral retinoblastoma , tumor development is initiated by somatic inactivation of both alleles of the RB1 gene .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| isolated unilateral retinoblastoma |
| somatic inactivation of both alleles of the RB1 gene |

In this paragraph, the two disease entities mentioned are "isolated unilateral retinoblastoma" and "somatic inactivation of both alleles of the RB1 gene." The first one is a type of eye cancer that affects one eye and is not associated with other abnormalities. The second one is a genetic mutation that is responsible for the development of retinoblastoma.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| isolated unilateral retinoblastoma |

In this paragraph, the only clear disease entity mentioned is "isolated unilateral retinoblastoma," which is a type of eye cancer that affects one eye and is not associated with other abnormalities. The other entity, "somatic inactivation of both alleles of the RB1 gene," is a genetic mutation that is responsible for the development of retinoblastoma, but it is not a disease itself.
